info.name: YouTube 720p - 2014
info.description: Makes the larger view of the youtube player 720p.
info.additionalInfo:
14.10.15 - Looks like YT is tweaking things again. Fixed. Sadly I can't do anything about the player layering on top of the header via css.
14.4.4 - Another big change by youtube. I tried to match the width (probably) to the below content area. Should responsively scale. Also I darkened the area to the left/right of the player and put a touch of glow. Classy. Let me know if you have any bugs.
14.2.22 - Fix for branding annotations.
